value: $WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pWhat...what is this feeling?$k$pI've...never felt like this before.$k$pThe children are gone, and yet...$k$pWhat IS this...and why is it so...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|You have reached the end
here, $Nu.$k$pWhich will it be? Everlasting joy
within the dream? Or the hollow
reality you've left behind?$k$p$EFace_Anger|...Since you've demonstrated your
inability to act with self-interest,
let me make the choice for you.$k$pHush now... And let my dream
drag you deeper and deeper.$k$p

$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Pain|RrraaAAHHH! You demand reality,
do you? Despite the consequences,
after everything?$k$pVery well... I will give you a taste
of the reality you crave.$k$pFor the death of my brother, have
the death of the álfar! Simple, real,
cause and effect.$k$pWith what power remains to me,
I will erase them from existence.
Their lives, memories...everything.$k$pIt will be as if the very idea of álfar
never existed.$k$p...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|All we need to do now is blow
the horn. Once we do that, the
dream will end.$k$pNow, don't you worry about me.
Look! I'm still alive—and full of
energy as ever!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス0,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...I'm sorry. The truth is...this will
all be over very soon.$k$pLady Freyja will end my life...
It will be as if I never existed...$k$pNothing can prevent that now.$k$p$EFace|But...I accept that.$k$pAll dreamers wake eventually...
Children will grow into adults...
That's the way things are.$k$pA child who has a sweet dream
wakes to feeling happy inside,
even if they can't remember why.$k$pThat is why dreams matter...even
though they end. Every dream
leaves its mark on reality.$k$pNow, your friends are waiting
for you to finally awaken.$k$pSo do it! Blow the horn.$k$pAnd...$Nu?$k$pThank you.$k$p$Sbs3000|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|
